alert.note: Alert for Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 27 at 11:34PM CDT until June 28 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR SUMNER COUNTY... At 1133 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of Mulvane to near Belle Plaine to near Blackwell, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wellington, Mulvane, Belle Plaine, Conway Springs, Caldwell, Oxford, South Haven, Geuda Springs, Mayfield, Milan, Hunnewell, Perth, Riverdale and Wellington Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
